content.title: CEA Shunting
content.definition: Selective shunting based on EEG changes, stump pressure <40mmHg, or contralateral occlusion. Some surgeons use routine shunting.
content.statement: CEA Shunting is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Pathology Carotid that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.
